body.p: Filter (App Filter) can be enabled/disabled-using tool bar buttons or menu. Filters must have been configured prior to this. (Refer section Configure - App Filter and Display Filter).

section.title: Display Filter
section.p: To enable message window filtering select App Filter Enable Display Filter or press Display Filter toolbar button shown in figure below.
To disable filtering select the toolbar button again. Filtering will toggle on each press.

section.title: Log Filter
section.p: To enabling filter for logging select App Filter Enable Log Filter or press Log Filter toolbar button shown in the fig. The filter will be applied on messages that are received after enabling the filter. To disable select the same menuitem or toolbar button again. Filtering will toggle on each press.

body.note:
Note
Message filter and Log filter will be applied only for the incoming messages after enabling the filter.
Filters can be Enabled/Disabled irrespective of tool connection status.
